title.narrative: Consolidating biodiversity and land conservation policies and actions as pillars of sustainable development

description.narrative: To strengthen the systemic, financial and institutional capacity for biodiversity conservation and sustainable land management, enhancing the effectiveness and sustainability of protected area management, stewardship of private lands and human well-being

participating-org.narrative: National Environment Directorate (DINAMA) / Ministry of Housing, Territorial Planning and the Environment (MVOTMA)
